text: The Republican Party (or Liberian Party) was a political party in Liberia. The people in the party were mostly Americo-Liberians who had mixed African and European ancestry and originated in the United States. The True Whig Party was the opposing party. == References == Category:Political parties in Africa Category:1848 establishments Category:1840s establishments in Africa Category:1899 disestablishments Category:Disestablishments in Africa Category:Organizations based in Liberia
title: Republican Party (Liberia)
